law.catch_line: An employee of the Commission may not disclose to any person other than a member of the Commission a...

text.section: An employee of the Commission may not disclose to any person other than a member of the Commission any information that the employee obtains about the business, property, or transactions of another.

A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction:
is subject to a fine not exceeding $500 or imprisonment not exceeding 18 months; and
is disqualified from appointment to or employment by the Commission.
